omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.en: When set to whitelist it only shows the sounds in the list. When set to blacklist it shows every sound except the ones in the list

omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.xO: The X offset of the whole 4 arrow HUD, supports decimals
omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.yO: The Y offset of the whole 4 arrow HUD, supports decimals
omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.ar: How long in milliseconds it takes before the arrows disappear
omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.ma: The range before it stops registering sounds
omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.ed: Shows all the static arrow locations for editing the offsets
omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.ar: Offset of the arrows relative to the center of the screen.
omni-directional-sound.midnightconfig.co: List of sounds. I recommend editing this in the config file itself with a text editor. needs the sound id.
